errors_only.label: Errors only
errors_only.doc: In error mode, messages with a category besides ERROR or FATAL are suppressed, and no reports are done by default. Error mode is compatible with disabling specific errors.

verbose.label: Verbose
verbose.doc: In verbose mode, extra non-checker-related info will be displayed.

disable.label: Disable IDs
disable.doc: Disable the message, report, category or checker with the given id(s). You can either give multiple identifiers separated by comma (,) or put this option multiple times (only on the command line, not in the configuration file where it should appear only once). You can also use "--disable=all" to disable everything first and then re-enable specific checks. For example, if you want to run only the similarities checker, you can use "--disable=all --enable=similarities". If you want to run only the classes checker, but have no Warning level messages displayed, use "--disable=all --enable=classes --disable=W".
